text: Excellent service, very affordable servicing for especially Avf vehicles. Boss is very accommodating and takes matters into own hands give good advice and even provide other workshop contacts for parts that they do not offer. Very professional for accident claims and repair works.

Sold my car at car city leasing. The whole process was smooth and quick. I didn't have to worry about anything. Excellent Service! Highly recommended to anyone who wants to sell their car.

Engaged Car City Auto Centre to sell my car. Nick was thoroughly professional & extremely helpful from start to end. He came on 2 occasions to take pictures & videos of my car for purpose of advertisement posting. Also came down to drive my car to prospective buyer for test drive and return it thereafter.  Very good service & totally hassle-free experience overall. Totally hassle free.  Highly recommend Nick & Car City to anyone thinking of selling your car.

When I applied for the service, I was impressed with the service of bringing a rental car to my house and taking the car .  It was a hassle to pay attention to car repairs in the midst of being busy, but it helped so much.  A person named Ninja was in charge, and he kindly explained and proceeded with each step.  Next time I have another repair job, I'll go to car city.
